pkgmetadata.longdescription: Smoothing Splines for Large Samples // Fits smoothing spline regression models using scalable algorithms designed for large samples. Five marginal spline types are supported: cubic, different cubic, cubic periodic, cubic thin-plate, and nominal. Random effects and parametric effects are also supported. Response can be Gaussian or non-Gaussian: Binomial, Poisson, Gamma, Inverse Gaussian, or Negative Binomial.
